type.description: The type of objective or reward.

content.description: Registry ID for the selected objective or reward. Alternatively, if using a command reward, the command as a string. When using command rewards, use %player% to refer to the player, and %amount% to refer to the amount of this reward that was generated, such as when using a /give command to give the player a specific quantity of something.

unitWorth.description: The amount of 'worth' that a single one of this objective will be worth. This value will be used to find suitable objectives that match the combined worth of the rewards.

weight.description: This is an arbitrary number that determines how often, relatively, this bounty reward will be picked compared to another. Rewards with higher weights will be picked more often. NOTE: Weight is not considered when picking objectives, just rewards!

min.description: Minimum amount of this objective or reward that will be generated in a bounty.

max.description: Maximum amount of this objective or reward that will be generated in a bounty.

timeMult.description: Time ,ultiplier, presumably? Unclear what this does.

nbt.description: NBT data for item rewards and objective. If you are not using an item reward/objective, or you do not wish for it to require specific NBT data, do not include this key.
